arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid in VAR rage over CANCELLED penalty goal as little-known rule earns brutal Thierry Henry verdict
arts.sum: Diego Simeone was furious as Real Madrid advanced in the Champions League at the expense of their city rivals after penalty shootout

arts.ttl: Atletico and Julian Alvarez were knocked out of the Champions League by one of the worst rules in football
arts.sum: Julian Alvarez was ruled to have hit the ball twice before scoring in Atletico’s penalty shootout defeat to Real Madrid, but only after VAR intervened to make the controversial judgement

arts.ttl: Thibaut Courtois Responds to Simeone’s Comments After Atletico’s Champions League Exit
arts.sum: Simeone had made headlines in the post-match press conference when he aggressively questioned journalists about Julián Álvarez’s double touch during his penalty attempt. The Belgian goalkeeper, speaking in the mixed zone after the game, dismissed Simeone’s complaints about the disallowed penalty and criticized the Atletico manager’s reaction.

arts.ttl: Diego Simeone reacts to Atletico Madrid penalty controversy
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid are out of the Champions League at the round of 16 stage after a penalty shoot-out defeat to city rivals Real Madrid. Los Colchoneros won the second leg 1-0 after a Conor Gallagher goal inside 30 seconds, but they could not do enough in the end, losing 4-2 on penalties. It was a […] The post Diego Simeone reacts to Atletico Madrid penalty controversy appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid into quarter-finals after beating Atletico Madrid on penalties
arts.sum: Real Madrid defeat local rivals Atletico Madrid on penalties to set up a quarter-final tie against Arsenal in the Champions League.

arts.ttl: WATCH: Atletico Madrid receive emphatic fan welcome before Real Madrid clash
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid are right up for the second leg of their Champions League round of 16 tie against Real Madrid – and so are their supporters. Ahead of the match at the Metropolitano on Wednesday evening, many of the fans attending were pictured welcoming their heroes for the derby clash. Diego Simeone spoke on the […] The post WATCH: Atletico Madrid receive emphatic fan welcome before Real Madrid clash appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Champions League live blog: Atléti-Real Madrid, Arsenal-PSV
arts.sum: Enjoy live updates from Wednesday's Champions League action as Atlético Madrid take on Real Madrid, Arsenal take on PSV and Aston Villa take on Brugge.

arts.ttl: Official: Ancelotti names Real Madrid XI for Atletico in UCL and decides on Mbappe
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappe is fit enough to start for Real Madrid in their Champions League derby...

arts.ttl: Champions League Live: Latest score, team news and updates as Atletico host Real in huge Madrid derby, while Arsenal and Aston Villa look to seal their quarter-final places after comfortable first-leg away wins
arts.sum: Follow Mail Sport's live blog for the latest score, team news and updates from the Champions League games of Atletico Madrid vs Real Madrid, Arsenal vs PSV and Aston Villa vs Club Brugge.

arts.ttl: Sources: Mbappé plans to start Madrid-Atléti clash
arts.sum: Real Madrid intend to start Kylian Mbappé in Wednesday's Champions League round-of-16 second leg, despite doubts about the forward's fitness.
